DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE The goal present project unravel importance bile acid-induced GLP-1 secretion ( via G protein-coupled receptor TGR5 ) human physiology . In present study investigator examine GLP-1 secretion healthy subject Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) patient . The investigator hypothesize patient T2DM relatively long duration characterize reduce gall bladder emptying , , consequently , reduce intestinal TGR5 activation ; result attenuate postprandial GLP-1 response ( primary endpoint ) .
DOC.brief_title: Importance Meal Fat Content Gall Bladder Emptying Postprandial GLP-1 Secretion Type 2 Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: ( Healthy ) HbA1 < 6 % Normal haemoglobin level Informed content ( T2DM ) T2DM > 5 year Normal haemoglobin level Informed content ( T2DM ) Treatment insulin , DPPIV inhibitor GLP1 analogues Obesity ( BMI > 30 ) Age > 70 year Gastrointestinal disease Nephropathy Liver disease Medication hold 12h Gastrointestinal surgery ( Healthy ) 1st degree relative diabetes Obesity ( BMI > 30 ) Age > 70 year Gastrointestinal disease Nephropathy Liver disease Medication hold 12h Gastrointestinal surgery
